description: Looking for a fresh dinner idea? Create your own vibrant chicken poke bowl using soy and ginger poke rice as a base. Try the recipe today.
name: Chicken and ginger poké bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 lime, juiced (plus lime cheeks to serve)
360g Uncle Ben’s Asian Inspired Soy & Ginger Poké Bowl Rice
1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic and 1 tbs soy sauce in a medium bowl. Add chicken and turn to coat. Set aside for 10 minutes.

Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add chicken and cook for 7 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and rest for 5 minutes. Slice chicken thinly.
Meanwhile, combine honey, lime juice, remaining oil and remaining soy sauce in a small bowl.
Prepare rice according to packet instructions.
Divide rice among bowls and top with chicken, snow peas, cucumber, radish and capsicum. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle over sesame seeds. Serve with lime cheeks.
